A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was full of cheesy lines and was without a plot. This was a horrible continuation of the starwars movies by George lucas. Most of the scenes inappropriately  dramatic and over-used close up shots. The only people who could enjoy this movie is 10yrs and under.  I went to the theater expecting a film akin to George Lucas's Star Wars and was extremely disappointed and very bored. There wwas inconsistencies in the storyline and frankly not much of a story at all. Only part I liked was the 3D space ship in the beginning of the movie.  I recommend a boycott to Disney starwars to demand a higher quality movie in the future.
